trans-unit.source: (Make sure your Python and Python script directory (for example, C:\Python27 and C:\Python27\Scripts) are in the PATH.)
trans-unit.target: （确保您的Python和Python脚本目录（例如 C:\Python27 和 C:\Python27\Scripts ）位于PATH中。）

trans-unit.source: -- Outdated #2 -- use setuptools as distribute is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: - 已过时＃2-已弃用分发，请使用setuptools。

trans-unit.source: 1) If you have installed Python 3.4 or later, pip is included with Python and should already be working on your system.
trans-unit.target: 1)如果你已经安装了Python 3.4或更高版本的Python,pip已经包含在Python中,应该已经在你的系统中工作了。

trans-unit.source: 2) If you are running a version below Python 3.4 or if pip was not installed with Python 3.4 for some reason, then you'd probably use pip's official installation script get-pip.py. The pip installer now grabs setuptools for you, and works regardless of architecture (32-bit or 64-bit).
trans-unit.target: 2）如果您运行的版本低于Python 3.4，或者由于某些原因未在Python 3.4中安装pip，则您可能会使用pip的官方安装脚本 get-pip.py 。pip安装程序现在可以为您获取setuptools，并且可以在不考虑体系结构（32位或64位）的情况下工作。

trans-unit.source: from the setuptools page --
trans-unit.target: 从setuptools页面 -

trans-unit.source: PythonXY comes with pip included, among others.
trans-unit.target: PythonXY自带 pip 包括，除其他。

trans-unit.source: pip is a replacement for easy_install. But should I install pip using easy_install on Windows? Is there a better way?
trans-unit.target: pip 替代了 easy_install 。但是我应该在Windows上使用 easy_install 安装 pip 吗？有没有更好的办法？

trans-unit.source: conda also comes with binaries for libraries with non-Python dependencies, e.g. pandas, numpy, etc. This proves useful particularly on Windows as it can be hard to correctly compile C dependencies.
trans-unit.target: conda 还附带了具有非Python依赖项的库的二进制文件，例如 pandas ， numpy 等。这在Windows上特别有用，因为可能很难正确编译C依赖项。

trans-unit.source: pip and easy_install aren't exactly the same thing, so there are some things you can get through pip but not easy_installand vice versa.
trans-unit.target: pip 和 easy_install 并不完全相同，因此有些东西可以通过 pip 获得，而 easy_install 不能，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: 2018 update:
trans-unit.target: 2018更新：

trans-unit.source: -- Outdated -- use distribute, not setuptools as described here. --
trans-unit.target: - 过时的 -使用分发，而不是此处所述的setuptools。-

trans-unit.target: 2014年更新：

trans-unit.source: Updated at 2016 :Pip should already be included in Python 2.7.9+ or 3.4+, but if for whatever reason it is not there, you can use the following one-liner.
trans-unit.target: 在2016年更新： Pip 应该已经包含在 Python 2.7.9+ or 3.4+ ，但是如果由于某种原因它不存在，则可以使用以下一种代码。

trans-unit.source: pip is already installed if you're using Python 2 >=2.7.9 or Python 3 >=3.4 binaries downloaded from python.org, but you'll need to upgrade pip.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是从python.org下载的Python 2> = 2.7.9或Python 3> = 3.4二进制文件，则已经安装了pip，但是您需要升级pip。

trans-unit.source: Add c:\Python2x\Scripts to the Windows path (replace the x in Python2x with the actual version number you have installed)
trans-unit.target: 添加 c:\Python2x\Scripts 到Windows路径（更换 x 在 Python2x 与您已安装的实际版本号）

trans-unit.source: Add this registry setting for 2.6+ versions of Python:
trans-unit.target: 为2.6以上版本的Python添加这个注册表设置。

trans-unit.source: Add your python C:\Python2x\Scripts to the path
trans-unit.target: 将python C:\Python2x\Scripts 到路径

trans-unit.source: After this, you may continue with:
trans-unit.target: 在这之后,你可以继续进行。

trans-unit.source: All of the other Python packages on the Chocolatey Gallery can be found here.
trans-unit.target: Chocolatey Gallery上的所有其他Python软件包都可以在这里找到。

trans-unit.source: Almost Done , Let test with CMD to install goole package using pip.
trans-unit.target: 差不多了,让我们用CMD测试一下,用pip安装goole包。

trans-unit.source: Also you need Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Express to get the good compiler and avoid these kind of messages when installing packages:
trans-unit.target: 另外，您还需要Microsoft Visual C ++ 2008 Express才能获得良好的编译器，并在安装软件包时避免出现此类消息：

trans-unit.source: Also, due to the different environments I found incredible useful to use Virtual Environments, I had websites that use different libraries and it's much better to encapsulate them into a single folder, check out the instructions, briefly if PIP is installed you just install VirtualEnv:
trans-unit.target: 另外,由于环境的不同,我发现使用虚拟环境是非常有用的,我有的网站使用不同的库,把它们封装到一个文件夹里会好很多,看看说明,简单的说,如果安装了PIP,你只需要安装VirtualEnv。

trans-unit.source: Alternative instructions
trans-unit.target: 替代指示

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can get pip-Win which is an all-in-one installer for pip and virtualenv on Windows and its GUI.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以获得pip-Win，它是Windows及其GUI上pip和 virtualenv 的多合一安装程序。

trans-unit.source: And seconds later you have a virtual environment with everything in venv folder, to activate it run venv/Scripts/activate.bat (deactivate the environment is easy, use deactivate.bat). Every library you install will end up in venv\Lib\site-packages and it's easy to move your whole environment somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 几秒钟后你就有了一个虚拟环境,所有的东西都在venv文件夹里,要激活它,请运行venvScriptsactivate.bat(停用环境很容易,使用deactivate.bat)。你安装的每一个库最终都会在venv/Libsite-packages中,这样你就可以很容易地把整个环境转移到其他地方。

trans-unit.source: And you probably want to add the path to your environment. It's somewhere like C:\Python33\Scripts.
trans-unit.target: 您可能想要添加环境路径。就像 C:\Python33\Scripts 。

trans-unit.source: And, alas for everyone using Python 2.7.8 or earlier (a sizable portion of the community). There's no plan to ship Pip to you. Manual instructions follow.
trans-unit.target: 而且,唉,对于所有使用Python 2.7.8或更早版本的人来说(社区中的相当一部分人)。没有计划将Pip发货给你。手册说明如下。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned in comments, the above command will download code from the Pip source code repository at GitHub, and dynamically run it at your environment. So be noticed that this is a shortcut of the steps download, inspect and run, all with a single command using Python itself. If you trust Pip, proceed without doubt.
trans-unit.target: 如评论中所述，以上命令将从GitHub上的Pip源代码存储库下载代码，并在您的环境中动态运行它。因此请注意，这是下载，检查和运行步骤的快捷方式，所有这些操作都使用Python本身通过一个命令完成。如果您信任Pip，请毫无疑问地继续。

trans-unit.source: As you mentioned pip doesn't include an independent installer, but you can install it with its predecessor easy_install.
trans-unit.target: 正如你提到的pip不包含独立的安装程序,但你可以用它的前身easy_install来安装。

trans-unit.source: BYE BYE!
trans-unit.target: BYE BYE!

trans-unit.source: Be sure that your Windows environment variable PATH includes Python's folders (for Python 2.7.x default install: C:\Python27 and C:\Python27\Scripts, for Python 3.3x: C:\Python33 and C:\Python33\Scripts, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 确保Windows环境变量PATH包含Python的文件夹（对于Python 2.7.x默认安装： C:\Python27 和 C:\Python27\Scripts ，对于Python 3.3x： C:\Python33 和 C:\Python33\Scripts ，以及依此类推）。

trans-unit.source: Can't believe there are so many lengthy (perhaps outdated?) answers out there. Feeling thankful to them but, please up-vote this short answer to help more new comers!
trans-unit.target: 不敢相信有这么多冗长的(也许是过时了?感觉很感谢他们,但是,请给这个简短的答案投上一票,以帮助更多的新人!

trans-unit.source: Change directory to the extracted folder: cd <path to extracted folder>/pip-1.2.1
trans-unit.target: 将目录更改为提取的文件夹： cd <path to extracted folder>/pip-1.2.1

trans-unit.source: Change the current directory to the Scripts directory for your Python installation (C:\Python27\Scripts) or add that directory, as well as the Python base installation directory to your %PATH% environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 将当前目录更改为您的Python安装的 Scripts 目录（ C:\Python27\Scripts ），或者将该目录以及Python基本安装目录添加到您的％PATH％环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Clearly, you will need to replace the 2.6 version with whatever version of Python you are running.
trans-unit.target: 显然,你需要用你正在运行的Python的任何版本来替换2.6版本。

trans-unit.source: Copy the virtualenv.py file from the decompressed folder of virtualenv, and paste inside the myproject folder
trans-unit.target: 副本virtualenv.py文件从解压缩文件夹 virtualenv ，并粘贴里面的myproject文件夹

trans-unit.source: Create and delete virtual environments, and switch between them
trans-unit.target: 创建和删除虚拟环境,并在它们之间进行切换

trans-unit.source: Double click to get-pip.py file.it will install pip to your computer.
trans-unit.target: 双击get-pip.py文件。它将把pip安装到您的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Download ez_setup.py and run it; it will download the appropriate .egg file and install it for you. (Currently, the provided .exe installer does not support 64-bit versions of Python for Windows, due to a distutils installer compatibility issue.
trans-unit.target: 下载ez_setup.py并运行它；它将下载适当的.egg文件并为您安装。（当前，由于distutils安装程序的兼容性问题，提供的.exe安装程序不支持Windows的64位版本的Python。

trans-unit.source: Download distribute - I threw mine in C:\Python27\Scripts (feel free to create a Scripts directory if it doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 下载分发 -我把我的代码放在 C:\Python27\Scripts （如果不存在，可以随意创建一个 Scripts 目录。

trans-unit.source: Download get-pip.py, being careful to save it as a .py file rather than .txt. Then, run it from the command prompt:
trans-unit.target: 下载 get-pip.py ，请小心将其另存为 .py 文件而不是 .txt 。然后，在命令提示符下运行它：

trans-unit.source: Download get-pip.py in the same folder or any other folder of your choice. I am assuming you will download it in the same folder from you have python.exe file and run this command
trans-unit.target: 将get-pip.py下载到同一文件夹或您选择的任何其他文件夹中。我假设您将从python.exe文件将其下载到同一文件夹中，然后运行此命令

trans-unit.source: Download get-pip.py to a folder on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 将get-pip.py下载到计算机上的文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Download https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py and run it with Administrator permission python get-pip.py (If you are on Linux, use sudo python get-pip.py)
trans-unit.target: 下载https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py并以管理员权限运行它 python get-pip.py （如果在Linux上，请使用 sudo python get-pip.py ）

trans-unit.source: Download pip 1.2.1 from https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pip/pip-1.2.1.tar.gz
trans-unit.target: 从https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pip/pip-1.2.1.tar.gz下载pip 1.2.1

trans-unit.target: 下载脚本：https : //raw.github.com/pypa/pip/master/contrib/get-pip.py

trans-unit.source: Download the last easy installer for Windows: (download the .exe at the bottom of http://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools ). Install it.

trans-unit.source: Download the pip installer: https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py

trans-unit.target: Finally

trans-unit.source: Flying in the face of its 'batteries included' motto, Python ships without a package manager. To make matters worse, Pip was—until recently—ironically difficult to install.
trans-unit.target: 面对“包括电池”的座右铭，Python出厂时没有软件包管理器。更糟糕的是，直到最近，Pip一直很难安装。

trans-unit.source: For Windows editions of the 64 bit variety - 64-bit Windows + Python used to require a separate installation method due to ez_setup, but I've tested the new distribute method on 64-bit Windows running 32-bit Python and 64-bit Python, and you can now use the same method for all versions of Windows/Python 2.7X:
trans-unit.target: 对于64位版本的Windows版本-由于ez_setup，64位Windows + Python以前需要单独的安装方法，但是我已经在运行32位Python和64位Python的64位Windows上测试了新的分发方法，现在您可以对所有版本的Windows / Python 2.7X使用相同的方法：

trans-unit.source: For example, to install the requests package using pip, run this from cmd:
trans-unit.target: 例如，要使用pip 安装 requests 包，请从cmd运行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: For me, this installed Pip at C:\Python27\Scripts\pip.exe. Find pip.exe on your computer, then add its folder (for example, C:\Python27\Scripts) to your path (Start / Edit environment variables). Now you should be able to run pip from the command line. Try installing a package:
trans-unit.target: 对我来说，这在 C:\Python27\Scripts\pip.exe 安装了Pip 。在计算机上找到 pip.exe ，然后将其文件夹（例如 C:\Python27\Scripts ）添加到路径（“开始/编辑”环境变量）中。现在，您应该可以从命令行运行 pip 了。尝试安装软件包：

trans-unit.source: For more ways to install pip/virtualenv/virtualenvwrapper, you can refer to thegauraw.tumblr.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关安装pip / virtualenv / virtualenvwrapper的更多方法，请访问thegauraw.tumblr.com。

trans-unit.source: For our sake, Christoph Gohlke prepares Windows installers (.msi) for popular Python packages. He builds installers for all Python versions, both 32 and 64 bit. You need to:
trans-unit.target: 为了我们的缘故，Christoph Gohlke 为流行的Python软件包准备了Windows安装程序（ .msi ）。他为所有32位和64位Python版本构建安装程序。你需要：

trans-unit.source: Go to Python command line and run below Python command
trans-unit.target: 进入Python命令行,运行下面的Python命令

trans-unit.source: Good news! Python 3.4 (released March 2014) and Python 2.7.9 (released December 2014) ship with Pip. This is the best feature of any Python release. It makes the community's wealth of libraries accessible to everyone. Newbies are no longer excluded from using community libraries by the prohibitive difficulty of setup. In shipping with a package manager, Python joins Ruby, Node.js, Haskell, Perl, Go—almost every other contemporary language with a majority open-source community. Thank you, Python.
trans-unit.target: 好消息！Pip随附了Python 3.4（2014年3月发布）和Python 2.7.9（2014年12月发布）。这是所有Python版本中的最佳功能。它使每个人都可以访问社区丰富的图书馆。新手不再因设置的困难而无法使用社区库。在与软件包管理器一起运送时，Python加入了Ruby，Node.js，Haskell，Perl，Go以及几乎所有其他具有主流开源社区的当代语言。谢谢，Python。

trans-unit.source: Guide link: http://www.pip-installer.org/en/latest/installing.html#install-pip
trans-unit.target: 指南链接：http : //www.pip-installer.org/en/latest/installing.html#install-pip

trans-unit.target: 你试过了吗?

trans-unit.source: Hope it helps.
trans-unit.target: 希望对你有帮助

trans-unit.source: How to install pip on Windows
trans-unit.target: 如何在Windows上安装pip

trans-unit.source: However the installation instructions for pip recommend using virtualenv since every virtualenv has pip installed in it automatically. This does not require root access or modify your system Python installation.
trans-unit.target: 但是pip 的安装说明建议使用virtualenv，因为每个virtualenv都会自动安装pip。这不需要root用户访问权限或修改系统Python安装。

trans-unit.source: I encounter same problem and then found such perhaps easiest way (one liner!) mentioned on official website here: http://www.pip-installer.org/en/latest/installing.html
trans-unit.target: 我遇到同样的问题，然后在以下官方网站上找到了这样一种也许最简单的方法（一个班轮！）：http : //www.pip-installer.org/en/latest/installing.html

trans-unit.source: I had some issues installing in different ways when I followed instructions here. I think it's very tricky to install in every Windows environment in the same way. In my case I need Python 2.6, 2.7 and 3.3 in the same machine for different purposes so that's why I think there're more problems. But the following instructions worked perfectly for me, so might be depending on your environment you should try this one:
trans-unit.target: 当我按照这里的说明进行安装时,我遇到了一些问题。我认为在每个Windows环境中以同样的方式安装是非常棘手的。在我的情况下,我需要Python 2.6、2.7和3.3在同一台机器上用于不同的目的,所以这就是我认为问题比较多的原因。但下面的说明对我来说很好用,所以可能根据你的环境不同,你应该试试这个。

trans-unit.source: I just wanted to add one more solution for those having issues installing setuptools from Windows 64-bit. The issue is discussed in this bug on python.org and is still unresolved as of the date of this comment. A simple workaround is mentioned and it works flawlessly. One registry change did the trick for me.
trans-unit.target: 我只是想为那些在Windows 64位安装setuptools时遇到问题的人补充一个解决方案。这个问题已经在python.org上的这个bug中讨论过了,截至本评论发布之日,这个问题仍未解决。这里提到了一个简单的解决方法,而且效果很好。一个注册表更改就解决了我的问题。

trans-unit.source: I use the cross-platform Anaconda package manager from continuum.io on Windows and it is reliable. It has virtual environment management and a fully featured shell with common utilities (e.g. conda, pip).
trans-unit.target: 我在Windows上使用来自continuum.io 的跨平台Anaconda软件包管理器，它很可靠。它具有虚拟环境管理功能以及具有常用功能（例如conda，pip）的功能齐全的外壳。

trans-unit.source: I'll leave the two sets of old instructions below for posterity.
trans-unit.target: 下面留下两套旧的说明,供后人参考。

trans-unit.source: I've built Windows installers for both distribute and pip here (the goal being to use pip without having to either bootstrap with easy_install or save and run Python scripts):
trans-unit.target: 我已经在此处为分发和pip构建了Windows安装程序（目标是使用 pip 而不用通过 easy_install 进行引导或保存并运行Python脚本）：

trans-unit.source: If paranoid, inspect file to confirm it isn't malicious (must b64 decode).
trans-unit.target: 如果疑神疑鬼,检查文件确认不是恶意的(必须是b64解码)。

trans-unit.source: If you do find that pip is not available when using Python 3.4+ or Python 2.7.9+, simply execute e.g.:
trans-unit.target: 如果你发现在使用Python 3.4+或Python 2.7.9+时,如果你发现pip不可用,只需执行例如....:

trans-unit.source: If you don't, run this one line command on your prompt (which may require administrator access):
trans-unit.target: 如果你没有,请在提示符上运行这个单行命令(可能需要管理员访问)。

trans-unit.source: If you have a 64-bit version of Windows 7, you may read 64-bit Python installation issues on 64-bit Windows 7 to successfully install the Python executable package (issue with registry entries).
trans-unit.target: 如果您具有Windows 7的64位版本，则可能会阅读64位Windows 7上的64位Python安装问题，以成功安装Python可执行程序包（带有注册表项）。

trans-unit.source: If you have tried installing pip through the Windows installer file from http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/#pip as suggested by @Colonel Panic, you might have installed the pip package manager successfully, but you might be unable to install any packages with pip. You might also have got the same SSL error as I got when I tried to install Beautiful Soup 4 if you look in the pip.log file:
trans-unit.target: 如果按照@Colonel Panic的建议，尝试通过Windows安装程序文件从http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/#pip安装pip ，则可能已成功安装了pip软件包管理器，但是您可能无法使用pip安装任何软件包。如果您在pip.log文件中查找，您可能还会遇到与尝试安装Beautiful Soup 4时遇到的SSL错误相同的错误：

trans-unit.source: If you work in an office, you might be behind an HTTP proxy. If so, set the environment variables http_proxy and https_proxy. Most Python applications (and other free software) respect these. Example syntax:
trans-unit.target: 如果您在办公室工作，则可能位于HTTP代理后面。如果是这样，请设置环境变量 http_proxy 和 https_proxy 。大多数Python应用程序（和其他免费软件）都遵守这些规定。语法示例：

trans-unit.source: If you're really unlucky, your proxy might be a Microsoft NTLM proxy. Free software can't cope. The only solution is to install a free software friendly proxy that forwards to the nasty proxy. http://cntlm.sourceforge.net/
trans-unit.target: 如果您真的很不幸，您的代理可能是Microsoft NTLM代理。自由软件无法应付。唯一的解决方案是安装一个免费软件友好代理，该代理转发给讨厌的代理。http://cntlm.sourceforge.net/

trans-unit.source: If you've got Python 3.4+ or 2.7.9+, it will be installed by default on Windows. Otherwise, in short:
trans-unit.target: 如果您拥有Python 3.4+或2.7.9+，则默认情况下将其安装在Windows上。否则，简而言之：

trans-unit.source: In case you want to use pip you have to check the PyPM option in the ActiveState installer. After installation you only need to logoff and log on again, and pip will be available on the commandline, because it is contained in the ActiveState installer PyPM option and the paths have been set by the installer for you already. PyPM will also be available, but you do not have to use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用 pip ，则必须在ActiveState安装程序中检查 PyPM 选项。安装后，您只需要注销并再次登录， pip 将在命令行中可用，因为它包含在ActiveState安装程序的 PyPM 选项中，并且安装程序已经为您设置了路径。 PyPM 也将可用，但您不必使用它。

trans-unit.source: In order to get the stub .exe files, you need to have a Visual C++ compiler (it is apparently compilable with MinGW as well)
trans-unit.target: 为了获取存根 .exe 文件，您需要具有Visual C ++编译器（显然也可以与MinGW一起编译）

trans-unit.source: Install or upgrade a package, or upgrade pip itself
trans-unit.target: 安装或升级一个软件包,或升级pip本身。

trans-unit.source: Install pip
trans-unit.target: 安装管道

trans-unit.source: Install pip using the newly installed setuptools: easy_install pip
trans-unit.target: 使用新安装的setuptools安装pip： easy_install pip

trans-unit.source: Install setuptools
trans-unit.target: 安装setuptools

trans-unit.source: Installers
trans-unit.target: Installers

trans-unit.source: Installing Pip for Python2 and Python3
trans-unit.target: 为 Python2 和 Python3 安装Pip

trans-unit.source: Installing Pip on Windows:
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上安装Pip。

trans-unit.source: Installing virtualenv still requires easy_install though.
trans-unit.target: 但安装 virtualenv 仍然需要 easy_install。

trans-unit.source: Installing with get-pip.py
trans-unit.target: 用get-pip.py安装

trans-unit.source: Into the folder you have all your files run
trans-unit.target: 把你所有的文件都放到你的文件夹里

trans-unit.source: It was tested on Windows 8 with PowerShell, Cmd, and Git Bash (MinGW).
trans-unit.target: 它已在Windows 8上使用PowerShell，Cmd和Git Bash（MinGW）进行了测试。

trans-unit.source: It will install pip. If Setuptools is not already installed, get-pip.py will install it for you too.
trans-unit.target: 它将安装pip。如果setuptools的尚未安装， get-pip.py 将会为您安装它了。

trans-unit.source: It will show you:
trans-unit.target: 它会告诉你。

trans-unit.source: It's very simple:
trans-unit.target: 这很简单。

trans-unit.source: Just download setuptools-15.2.zip (md5), from here https://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools#windows-simplified , and run ez_setup.py.
trans-unit.target: 只需从此处https://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools#windows-simplified下载setuptools-15.2.zip（md5），然后运行ez_setup.py。

trans-unit.source: Link: http://bugs.python.org/issue6792#
trans-unit.target: 链接：http：//bugs.python.org/issue6792#

trans-unit.source: My recommendation is that you get ActivePython Community Edition and don't worry about the huge hassle of getting everything set up for Python on Windows. Then, you can just use pypm.
trans-unit.target: 我的建议是您获得ActivePython社区版，并且不必担心在Windows上为Python设置所有内容的麻烦。然后，您可以使用 pypm 。

trans-unit.source: Navigate to that path from command prompt and run " python get-pip.py "
trans-unit.target: 从命令提示符导航到该路径,然后运行 " python get-pip.py "

trans-unit.source: Note: Make sure scripts path like this (C:\Python27\Scripts) is added int %PATH% environment variable as well.
trans-unit.target: 注意:确保脚本路径是这样的(C:\Python27\Scripts)也被添加了%PATH%环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Now , lets add python and pip into environment variable path settings if you are on windows, so that typing pip or python anywhere call python aor pip from where they are installed.
trans-unit.target: 现在,让我们把python和pip添加到环境变量路径设置中,如果你是在windows系统下,那么在任何地方键入pip或python,就可以在安装的地方调用python或pip。

trans-unit.source: Now create a virtual environment, let’s say myvirtualenv as follows, inside the myproject folder:
trans-unit.target: 现在，在myproject文件夹中创建一个虚拟环境，如下所示，使用myvirtualenv：

trans-unit.source: Now make sure C:\Python27\Scripts is in PATH because pip is installed in the C:\Python27\Scripts directory unlike C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages where Python packages are normally installed
trans-unit.target: 现在确保 C:\Python27\Scripts 是路径，因为PIP是安装在 C:\Python27\Scripts 不像目录 C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages ，其中Python包通常安装

trans-unit.source: Now try to install any package using pip.
trans-unit.target: 现在尝试使用pip安装任何软件包。

trans-unit.source: Now you are ready to use pip. Open cmd and type as
trans-unit.target: 现在您可以使用点子了。打开 cmd 并输入为

trans-unit.source: Now you can install python packages by running
trans-unit.target: 现在你可以通过运行

trans-unit.source: Now you can start using pip, but make sure you have activated the virtualenv looking at the left of your prompt.
trans-unit.target: 现在你可以开始使用pip了,但要确保你已经激活了virtualenv,看左边的提示符。

trans-unit.source: Now you can use pip install package to easily install packages as in Linux :)
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以像Linux一样使用 pip install package 轻松安装软件包：)

trans-unit.source: Now you have to add C:\Python27\Scripts path to your enviroment variable.Because it includes pip.exe file.
trans-unit.target: 现在您必须在环境变量中添加 C:\Python27\Scripts 路径，因为它包含 pip.exe 文件。

trans-unit.source: Now your virtual environment, myvirtualenv, is created inside your project folder. You might notice, pip is now installed inside you virtual environment. All you need to do is activate the virtual environment with the following command.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您的虚拟环境myvirtualenv已在项目文件夹中创建。您可能会注意到，虚拟环境中现已安装了pip。您需要做的就是使用以下命令激活虚拟环境。

trans-unit.source: Now, it is bundled with Python. You don't need to install it.
trans-unit.target: 现在,它已与Python捆绑在一起。你不需要安装它。

trans-unit.source: Of course, that doesn't mean Python packaging is problem solved. The experience remains frustrating. I discuss this in the Stack Overflow question Does Python have a package/module management system?.
trans-unit.target: 当然，这并不意味着Python封装可以解决问题。经验仍然令人沮丧。我将在“堆栈溢出”问题中对此进行讨论。Python是否具有包/模块管理系统？。

trans-unit.source: Official instructions
trans-unit.target: 正式指示

trans-unit.source: Often though it's easier to check Christoph's site for your package.
trans-unit.target: 通常，检查克里斯托夫网站上的包裹通常比较容易。

trans-unit.source: Old answer (still valid)
trans-unit.target: 旧答案(仍然有效)

trans-unit.source: On Windows upgrade can be done easily
trans-unit.target: 在Windows系统上可以轻松完成升级

trans-unit.source: On Windows, simply download and install first distribute, then pip from the above links. The distribute link above does contain stub .exe installers, and these are currently 32-bit only. I haven't tested the effect on 64-bit Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上，只需下载和安装先 distribute ，然后 pip 从上面的链接。上面的 distribute 链接确实包含存根 .exe 安装程序，并且这些当前仅32位。我尚未在64位Windows上测试过效果。

trans-unit.source: Once this is installed, all you have to do is open a command prompt and run the following the three commands below, which will install Python 2.7, easy_install and pip. It will automatically detect whether you're on x64 or x86 Windows.
trans-unit.target: 安装完成后,你只需要打开命令提示符,运行下面的三个命令,就可以安装Python 2.7、easy_install和pip。它将自动检测你是在x64还是x86 Windows上。

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt and navigate to the folder containing get-pip.py.
trans-unit.target: 打开命令提示符，然后导航到包含 get-pip.py 的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Open a console in the download folder as Admin and run get-pip.py. Alternatively, right-click its icon in Explorer and choose the "run as Admin...".
trans-unit.target: 以Admin身份在下载文件夹中打开一个控制台，然后运行 get-pip.py 。或者，在资源管理器中右键单击其图标，然后选择“以管理员身份运行...”。

trans-unit.source: Open a new (!) DOS prompt. From there run easy_install pip
trans-unit.target: 打开一个新的（！）DOS提示符。从那里运行 easy_install pip

trans-unit.source: Open up a command prompt (on Windows you should check out conemu2 if you don't use PowerShell) and change (cd) to the directory you've downloaded distribute_setup.py to.
trans-unit.target: 打开命令提示符（在Windows上，如果不使用PowerShell，则应签出conumu2），然后将（ cd ）更改为已将 distribute_setup.py 下载到的目录。

trans-unit.source: PS:
trans-unit.target: PS:

trans-unit.source: Per https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installing/#do-i-need-to-install-pip:
trans-unit.target: 根据https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installing/#do-i-need-to-install-pip：

trans-unit.source: Pip is installed, then add the path to your environment :
trans-unit.target: Pip安装好了,然后将路径添加到你的环境中。

trans-unit.source: Pip should be now installed!
trans-unit.target: 管道应该已经安装好了!

trans-unit.source: Pip's installation guide is pretty clean and simple.
trans-unit.target: Pip的安装指南非常干净和简单。

trans-unit.source: Proxy problems
trans-unit.target: 代理人的问题

trans-unit.source: Python 2 ≤ 2.7.8 and Python 3 ≤ 3.3
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Python 2≤2.7.8和Python 3≤3.3</font></font>

trans-unit.source: Python 2.7.9 and later (on the Python 2 series), and Python 3.4 and later include pip by default, so you may have pip already.
trans-unit.target: Python 2.7.9 和更高版本的 Python 2.7.9 (在 Python 2 系列上),以及 Python 3.4 和更高版本的 Python 3.4 默认包含 pip,所以你可能已经有了 pip。

trans-unit.source: Python 2.7.9+ and 3.4+
trans-unit.target: Python 2.7.9+和3.4+

trans-unit.source: Python 3.3+ now includes the venv module for easily creating virtual environments like so:
trans-unit.target: Python 3.3+现在包含venv模块，可轻松创建虚拟环境，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Python 3.4, which was released in March 2014, comes with pip included:
trans-unit.target: 2014年3月发布的Python 3.4带有 pip ,包括：

trans-unit.source: Python modules can be partly written in C or C++. Pip tries to compile from source. If you don't have a C/C++ compiler installed and configured, you'll see this cryptic error message.
trans-unit.target: Python模块可以部分用C或C++编写。Pip试图从源码中编译。如果你没有安装和配置CC++编译器,你会看到这个隐约的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Run python setup.py install
trans-unit.target: 运行 python setup.py install

trans-unit.source: Run distribute_setup: python distribute_setup.py (This will not work if your python installation directory is not added to your path - go here for help)
trans-unit.target: 运行distribute_setup： python distribute_setup.py （如果您的python安装目录未添加到您的路径，则此方法将不起作用- 请在此处获得帮助）

trans-unit.source: Run the IDLE or another Python script, with the selected interpreter
trans-unit.target: 使用选定的解释器运行IDLE或其他Python脚本

trans-unit.source: Run the following command:python get-pip.py, python3 get-pip.py or python3.6 get-pip.py, depending on which version of python you want to install pip
trans-unit.target: 运行以下命令： python get-pip.py ， python3 get-pip.py 或 python3.6 get-pip.py ，这取决于要安装 pip 的 python 版本

trans-unit.source: Save it on drive somewhere like C:\pip-script\get-pip.py
trans-unit.target: 保存在驱动器中,如C:\pip-scriptget-pip.py。

trans-unit.source: See all installed packages, and whether they are up-to-date
trans-unit.target: 查看所有已安装的软件包,以及它们是否是最新的。

trans-unit.source: See documentation for different platform methods of activating the environment after creation, but typically one of:
trans-unit.target: 激活环境创建后的不同平台方法见文档,但通常是其中之一。

trans-unit.source: So, PIP is found under the folder in above screen "SCRIPTS" Lets add Python and PIP in environment variable path.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在屏幕上方“ SCRIPTS ” 下的文件夹下找到PIP，让我们在环境变量路径中添加Python和PIP。

trans-unit.source: So, since the release of Python 3.4, the up-to-date way to install pip on Windows is to just install Python.
trans-unit.target: 所以,自从Python 3.4发布后,在Windows上安装pip的最新方法就是直接安装Python。

trans-unit.source: So:
trans-unit.target: So:

trans-unit.source: Solution that worked for me...:
trans-unit.target: 对我有效的解决方案.....:

trans-unit.source: Switch from one Python interpreter (i.e. version) to another (including py and pypy)
trans-unit.target: 从一个Python解释器(即版本)切换到另一个(包括py和pypy)。

trans-unit.source: The best way I found so far, is just two lines of code:
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止,我发现最好的方法,就是两行代码。

trans-unit.source: The following works for Python 2.7. Save this script and launch it:
trans-unit.target: 下面这个脚本适用于Python 2.7。保存这个脚本并启动它。

trans-unit.source: The installation instructions are detailed here and involve:
trans-unit.target: 此处详细说明了安装说明，涉及以下内容：

trans-unit.source: The last step will not work unless you're either in the directory easy_install.exe is located in (C:\Python27\Scripts would be the default for Python 2.7), or you have that directory added to your path.
trans-unit.target: 除非您位于目录 easy_install.exe （C：\ Python27 \ Scripts将是Python 2.7的默认设置）中，或者您将该目录添加到路径中，否则最后一步将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The new binaries pip.exe (and the deprecated easy_install.exe) will be found in the "%ProgramFiles%\PythonXX\Scripts" folder (or similar), which is often not in your PATH variable. I recommend adding it.
trans-unit.target: 新的二进制文件 pip.exe （和不建议使用的 easy_install.exe ）可以在 "%ProgramFiles%\PythonXX\Scripts" 文件夹（或类似文件夹）中找到，该文件夹通常不在您的 PATH 变量中。我建议添加它。

trans-unit.source: The official documentation tells users to install Pip and each of its dependencies from source. That's tedious for the experienced and prohibitively difficult for newbies.
trans-unit.target: 官方文档告诉用户要从源码中安装Pip和它的每个依赖项。这对有经验的人来说很繁琐,而对新手来说则很难。

trans-unit.source: The only downside I found is some code editors can't recognize this kind of environments, and you will see warnings in your code because imported libraries are not found. Of course there're tricky ways to do it but it would be nice editors keep in mind Virtual Environments are very normal nowadays.
trans-unit.target: 我发现唯一的缺点是有些代码编辑器无法识别这种环境,你会在代码中看到警告,因为导入的库没有找到,所以你会看到警告。当然有一些棘手的方法,但如果编辑们能记住虚拟环境是很好的,现在的虚拟环境很正常。

trans-unit.source: The problem is an issue with an old version of OpenSSL being incompatible with pip 1.3.1 and above versions. The easy workaround for now, is to install pip 1.2.1, which does not require SSL:
trans-unit.target: 问题是OpenSSL的旧版本与pip 1.3.1及更高版本不兼容。目前，最简单的解决方法是安装不需要SSL的 pip 1.2.1 ：

trans-unit.source: The process to redo this for new versions is not difficult, and I've included it here for reference.
trans-unit.target: 新版本的重做的过程并不难,我在此附上,供大家参考。

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to use it is to call it as a module, especially with multiple python distributions or versions installed, to guarantee packages go to the correct place:
trans-unit.target: 推荐的使用方法是将其作为一个模块来调用,尤其是在安装了多个python发行版或版本的情况下,建议将其作为一个模块来调用,这样可以保证包到正确的地方。

trans-unit.source: The up-to-date way is to use Windows' package manager Chocolatey.
trans-unit.target: 最新的方法是使用Windows的软件包管理器Chocolatey。

trans-unit.source: Then add C:\Python37\Scripts path to your environment variable. Assumes that there is a Python37 folder in your C drive, that folder name may varied according to the installed python version
trans-unit.target: 然后将 C:\Python37\Scripts 路径添加到您的环境变量。假设您的C盘中有一个 Python37 文件夹，该文件夹名称可能会因安装的python版本而异

trans-unit.source: Then run the following (which may require administrator access):
trans-unit.target: 然后运行下面的程序(可能需要管理员访问)。

trans-unit.source: There you go (hopefully)! Solutions for common problems are given below:
trans-unit.target: 你去了(希望如此)! 常见问题的解决方案如下。

trans-unit.source: These answers are outdated or otherwise wordy and difficult.
trans-unit.target: 这些答案都是过时的,或者是其他的措辞和困难。

trans-unit.source: This installs the pip package, which (in Windows) contains ...\Scripts\pip.exe that path must be in PATH environment variable to use pip from the command line (see the second part of 'Alternative Instructions' for adding it to your PATH,
trans-unit.target: 这将安装pip包,其中(在Windows中)包含了...\Scripts\pip.exe,该路径必须在PATH环境变量中,以便在命令行中使用pip(参见 "替代说明 "的第二部分,将其添加到PATH中。

trans-unit.source: This is how you can check whether pip is installed or not. In rare case, if it is not installed, download get-pip.py file and run it with python as
trans-unit.target: 这样可以检查是否已安装pip。在极少数情况下，如果未安装，请下载get-pip.py文件并使用python作为

trans-unit.source: This is most likely the registry setting you will already have for Python 2.6+:
trans-unit.target: 这很可能是您在 Python 2.6+中已经拥有的注册表设置。

trans-unit.source: This is one of the easiest way to install pip i.e. inside virtual environment, but you need to have virtualenv.py file with you.
trans-unit.target: 这是最简单的安装pip的方法之一,也就是在虚拟环境中安装pip,但你需要带着virtualenv.py文件。

trans-unit.source: This should already be satisfied in most cases but, if necessary, be sure that your environment variable PATH includes Python's folders (for example, Python 2.7.x on Windows default install: C:\Python27 and C:\Python27\Scripts, for Python 3.3x: C:\Python33 and C:\Python33\Scripts, etc)
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这应该已经满足了，但是，如果需要，请确保环境变量PATH包含Python的文件夹（例如，Windows默认安装的 Python 2.7.x ： C:\Python27 and C:\Python27\Scripts ，用于 Python 3.3x ： C:\Python33 and C:\Python33\Scripts 等）

trans-unit.source: To install or upgrade pip, securely download get-pip.py.
trans-unit.target: 要安装或升级pip，请安全下载get-pip.py。

trans-unit.source: To install pip globally on Python 2.x, easy_install appears to be the best solution as Adrián states.
trans-unit.target: 要在Python 2.x上全局安装pip ，如Adrián所述，easy_install似乎是最佳的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: To upgrade an existing setuptools (or distribute), run pip install -U setuptools
trans-unit.target: 要升级（或分发）现有的setuptools，请运行 pip install -U setuptools

trans-unit.source: To use pip, it is not mandatory that you need to install pip in the system directly. You can use it through virtualenv. What you can do is follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 要使用pip，并不一定需要直接在系统中安装pip。您可以通过 virtualenv 使用它。您可以按照以下步骤操作：

trans-unit.source: Unable to find vcvarsall.bat
trans-unit.target: 无法找到vcvarsall.bat

trans-unit.source: Uncompress it
trans-unit.target: 解压

trans-unit.source: Unzip it with 7zip or some other tool
trans-unit.target: 用7zip或其他工具解压。

trans-unit.source: Use CURL to download get-pip.py
trans-unit.target: 使用CURL下载get-pip.py

trans-unit.source: Using this you should be able to get started with Pip in under two minutes.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个,你应该可以在两分钟内就可以开始使用Pip。

trans-unit.source: We normally need to install Python packages for one particular project. So, now create a project folder, let’s say myproject.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我们通常需要为一个特定项目安装Python软件包。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">因此，现在创建一个项目文件夹，比方说myproject。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: When I have to use Windows, I use ActivePython, which automatically adds everything to your PATH and includes a package manager called PyPM which provides binary package management making it faster and simpler to install packages.
trans-unit.target: 当我必须使用Windows时，我使用ActivePython，它会自动将所有内容添加到PATH中，并包括一个名为PyPM的软件包管理器，该软件包管理器提供了二进制软件包管理功能，从而使安装软件包变得更快，更简单。

trans-unit.source: Whola! requests will be successfully installed and you will get a success message.
trans-unit.target: 哇！ requests 将被成功安装，您将收到一条成功消息。

trans-unit.source: Working as of Feb 04 2014 :):
trans-unit.target: 截至2014年2月4日的工作:)。

trans-unit.source: You are done.
trans-unit.target: 你已经完成了。

trans-unit.source: You can fix that by installing a C++ compiler such as MinGW or Visual C++. Microsoft actually ships one specifically for use with Python. Or try Microsoft Visual C++ Compiler for Python 2.7.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过安装C ++编译器（例如MinGW或Visual C ++）来解决此问题。微软实际上提供了一个专门用于Python的工具。或尝试使用适用于Python 2.7的Microsoft Visual C ++编译器。

trans-unit.source: You possibly need an administrator command prompt to do this. Follow Start a Command Prompt as an Administrator (Microsoft TechNet).
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要管理员命令提示符才能执行此操作。按照以管理员身份启动命令提示符（Microsoft TechNet）。

trans-unit.source: You will see the following at the command prompt:
trans-unit.target: 你会在命令提示符中看到以下内容。

trans-unit.source: copy and paste these content in a file as get-pip.py
trans-unit.target: 将这些内容复制并粘贴为get-pip.py文件

trans-unit.source: copy and paste get-pip.py into python folder.C:\Python27
trans-unit.target: 将get-pip.py复制并粘贴到python文件夹中。 C:\Python27

trans-unit.source: copy the uncompressed pip folder content into C:\Python2x\ folder (don't copy the whole folder into it, just the content), because python command doesn't work outside C:\Python2x folder and then run: python setup.py install
trans-unit.target: 将未压缩的pip文件夹内容复制到 C:\Python2x\ 文件夹（不要将整个文件夹复制到其中，仅复制内容），因为python命令在 C:\Python2x 文件夹外不起作用，然后运行： python setup.py install

trans-unit.source: distribute-0.6.27.win32.exe
trans-unit.target: distribute-0.6.27.win32.exe

trans-unit.source: if you even have other problems with pip version you can try this
trans-unit.target: 如果你在pip版本中还有其他问题,你可以试试这个

trans-unit.source: it's probably the easiest to install pip on any system.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是最容易安装管道的系统。

trans-unit.source: make sure where you install python for me its was in the following directory
trans-unit.target: 确保你安装python的位置对我来说是在下面的目录中。

trans-unit.source: pip-1.1.win32.exe
trans-unit.target: pip-1.1.win32.exe

trans-unit.source: python -m pip install -U pip
trans-unit.target: python -m pip install -U pip
